Articles.Content:
Developer of this mod is no longer supports it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

It is unlikely that he will update it.

~~ah, sorry for my bad english~~

> 
> 
> 16 hours ago, DiversaL said:
> 
> 
> When i installed this mod , I decided to play , when i created sandbox mode and entered , my game center is all black and after that it doesnt respond , help please
> 

You **HAVE** **TO** update the **Kopernicus** folder from the mod's version to the latest release.

[https://github.com/Kopernicus/Kopernicus/releases](https://github.com/Kopernicus/Kopernicus/releases)

Same goes for the **E.V.E.** folder if you want to upgrade the clouds for the planets.

[https://github.com/rbray89/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements/releases](https://github.com/rbray89/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements/releases/tag/EVE-1.05-1)

Yeah I figured, I'm kind of tempted to take over the updates for the mod if I could, but my coding skill are too sub-par to do that. I hope that he will come back or someone else will pick it up to update it for 1.1 in the future.
Now we need someone to make Kerbal Universe.... Multiple galaxies.

> 
> 12 minutes ago, UnionPacific1983WP said:
> 
> 
> Now we need someone to make Kerbal Universe.... Multiple galaxies.
> 

Multiple dimensions...

Maybe one where the solar system is 10x bigger and there are these things called 'Humans'

Someone should take over and and continue to develop this mod (and also fix it so it's not buggy as hell XD).

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-03T03:20:23Z" title="01/03/2016 03:20  AM" data-short="8 yr">January 3, 2016</time> by Kerbl101**

> 
> 
> On 12/28/2015 at 7:05 PM, UnionPacific1983WP said:
> 
> 
> Now we need someone to make Kerbal Universe.... Multiple galaxies.
> 

There was a mod for Planet Factory called Kerbal Universe. It added two stars (Abaddon and Manai) and a few new planets to the Kerbol System. I would like to revived it and (maybe) put the Abaddon and Manai systems in Interstellar Adventure Revived. In fact, IA-Revived could also be used to revive multiple other dead mods that added in other solar systems (like GavinColeX's Asteria system).

Also the Abaddon in KU was totally different than this Abaddon.

I'm pretty sure it was Miller's planet with the 1.3 g and Mann's with 0.8, from the movie  

Is that reversed? I watched a video on this mod and it says Mann's had 1.32 g ASL in the little sidebar info thingy.

I like the progress on the mod so far, especially the Neutron Star. Great job and keep it up!

Btw, a cool idea would be to (EVENTUALLY!) add a binary star system, and/or a binary planet/moon system. I know that the way the planets an whatnot are set up, that would be quite difficult, but really, really cool!

[![binary-star-spiral.jpg?1377296353](http://i.space.com/images/i/000/032/081/i02/binary-star-spiral.jpg?1377296353)](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjVw5y9ibTKAhXLWT4KHTqiDKIQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.space.com%2F22509-binary-stars.html&psig=AFQjCNGtp597ZVF5sZBsIWK7f_bgng0ALw&ust=1453230916858388)

[http://www.space.com/22509-binary-stars.html](http://www.space.com/22509-binary-stars.html)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-18T19:18:21Z" title="01/18/2016 07:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">January 18, 2016</time> by FallOutcastPlays**
  
Clarity Purposes
What would it take to make this compatible with RSS? I.e., scale up all the planet sizes and orbits to be more realistic?
Unfortunately Artyomka has decided to abandon this mod too buggy.
Would it be possible to salvage a few of the planets (Eden, Aelion)? I don't need the whole galaxy, just a couple of planets scaled up for RSS.
Why does this keep on crashing my game?
You should add a quasar m8

My Kerbal Galaxy just simply wont load. I go to the space center view and its just stars. Nothing to select, and module manager says it applies 375 patches.

Could I have some help?

[EXC 19:13:15.540] InvalidOperationException: Operation is not valid due to the current state of the object

        System.Linq.Enumerable.First[StarComponent] (IEnumerable`1 source, System.Func`2 predicate)

Well there's a "newer version" of KG2 for 1.05 here which might help, but currently it seems to be buggier than this older version here:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/131911-official-release-of-kerbal-galaxy-revamped-semi-stable-v0275-105/&do=embed"></iframe>

I'd back up your old KG2 version and saves before trying that version, if it doesn't work try running stock KSP with just KG2 then add mods back to it until it starts messing up again.

Also i have a stable version available from my mod packs I made for 1.05 for my KSP multiplayer server that works just fine: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/19pLlzakWGu-O8uK-Cc0IWXwgmxqUNQtie8eqCEankgk/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19pLlzakWGu-O8uK-Cc0IWXwgmxqUNQtie8eqCEankgk/edit?usp=sharing)

(NOTE: it comes with many other mods so it's not advised to use it just to extract KG2 from)

**ALSO I DECLARE THIS THREAD DEAD AS THE MOD IS NOW DEVELOPED BY ANOTHER AUTHOR IN THE LINK MENTIONED ABOVE SO THE MODERATORS CAN CLOSE THIS FORUM IF THEY WANT.**
